name: OneCommandOneAction
description:
This game is developed for #Trijam 165.

In this game, you should beat the enemy with  some commands . 

You can select these command as One Action : 

  • Attack : Use 1 stock and damage to enemy.
  • Charge ; Charge the 1 stock for attack and skill.
  • Guard : Guard the enemy's attack.
  • Skill : Use 2 stocks, damage to enemy.

Thank you for watching my game!  I f there are some bugs, please tell me : ). I am appreciate for your feedback to this game !
